Text:
@TheTess
I know, this is disgusting behaviour from the parents and this is the reason I backed it up, so it can never leave the internet! Children must have their rights too, they are human beings! Thanks Tess for the comment.

On November 3rd 2011, there was a problem with the torrent. There were no Seeders active and I accidentally deleted the torrent, so about 50 people were stuck on 28.3% for the whole day. Problem is now fixed! Enjoy the download!
